unnormalised: Bore, aaz classant konnen tori probability vixim vicharlem, ani tbh, hanv ekdom blank zalom. Mhonnllear, te soglle formula kitench? Amchea maths teachern, Mr. Sharman Bayes' Theorem sangtalo - P(A|B) = P(B|A) * P(A) / P(B) vixim kiteim tori. Mhojem taklem girgirtaalem! Tannem factorynt nastelea phoneancher ek udharon dilem, phone nashto zaunk 0.05 chance aasa mhonn, punn mhojem brain kam korunk naslem. Hi vostu somzunk ek soppi vatter aasa kai?
normalised: Boro, aiz klasant konnem tori probabiliity vixim vicharle, ani sat sangta, hanv pura rikto aslo. Koxem mhonnche, tea sogllea formulanchim kashtam kiteak? Amchea mathsache xikpi, Mister Sharma, Bayes' Theorem sangtale - kitem tori P of A given B mhollear P of B given A gunnlelem P of A bhagilelem P of B. Mhojem tale firta! Tannem factoryant nashtea phonesache vixim ek udahoron dilem ek phone chukichem asonk zero point zero panch sandi asa, punn mhojem mon tanak mellonaaslem. Hi vostu somzunk sopea margan asa?

unnormalised: Magir statistics aasa. Ami standard deviation ani variance calculate kortaanv, {2, 4, 6, 8, 10} sarkhea datasets vaprun. Tem sogllem khub abstract aasa. Ani mean 6 aasa ani standard deviation 2.83 sarkhem kiteim aasa mhonn zanno ravun kai faido? Satyan sangta, hanv literally kiteim tori kortolom, novea Bollywood filmanchero dollo dovrun sarkhem. Hanvem aikolem kiteim nove special effects asat, sigma notation poraan odhik ruchicho.
normalised: Uprant, statistics asa. Ami standard deviation ani variance don, char, so, atth, dhaasarkea datasetsa vaprun calculate kortat. Te soglle atrut asat. Ani mean so ani standard deviation don point atth tin asonk kitem faido? Sat sangta, hanv dusrem kitem tori kortolo, koxem mhonnche adlo Bollywood cinema polleunk. Mhakalem aikolem kitem tori naven speshial effekts asat, sigma notation sarkea odhik ruchichem kornne.

unnormalised: Basically, hanv zhuztai. Probability ani statistics komiâ€¦dhaakhte korunk kiteim tips asat? Kiteim bore YouTube channels vo online resources asat je hem sopem sangtat? Maybe kiteim real-world udharonam astolem je click kortolem? Hanv zanno aasanv tem data analysis sarkhea vostun khatir zaitim mhotvachem, punn atam, tem kiteim tori random numbers ani symbols eksarkhea zomblyasarokhem dista. Ek bhaaichi modot kara!
normalised: Mullanth, hanv trasan asa. Probability ani statistics komi...bhiye koxe koronk? Khub borea You Tube channelam asat vo online resources asat je hi vostu sopea utrant sangtat? Kaim asli jivitantli udahoronam asat je tankam click kortole? Mhakalem kollta tem data analysis ani vostunche vixim important asa, punn atam, tem fakt randam ankde ani chinnam ekatrai zavn dista. Eka bhavaak maddat kor!
